name: neokpi
description: Chrome Extension that enhances Alert Debug with keyboard shortcuts, note-taking, bulk processing, and video controls

scripts.build:extension: rollup -c && echo 'Chrome Extension built! Load dist/chrome-extension as unpacked extension.'
scripts.build:tampermonkey: rollup -c && echo 'Tampermonkey script built! Copy dist/tampermonkey-script.js to Tampermonkey.'
scripts.package:store: npm run build && cd dist/chrome-extension && zip -r ../neokpi-chrome-extension.zip . && echo 'Extension packaged! Upload dist/neokpi-chrome-extension.zip to Chrome Web Store.'
scripts.docs:all: npm run docs:generate && npm run docs:internal
